word_mean: 在甲板、平台、走道和棚顶等边沿设置的围栏。由栏杆柱、扶手和横栅栏等组成。

sentence.Network_en: There was a splintering sound as the railing gave way.
sentence.Network_cn: 围栏倒下时发出了断裂的声音。

sentence.Network_en: He felt the hardness of the iron railing press against his spine.
sentence.Network_cn: 他感觉到硬邦邦的铁栏杆顶着自己的脊梁。

sentence.Network_en: He leant against the railing, his breath coming in short gasps.
sentence.Network_cn: 他倚着栏杆, 急促地喘气.

entry.def: A fence made from metal bars is called a railing or railings.

example.ex: He walked out on to the balcony where he rested his arms on the railing.
example.tran: 他走上阳台，把胳膊搭在栏杆上。

example.ex: ...the iron railings of the convent grounds.
example.tran: 女修道院院落周围的铁栏杆

means.word_mean: 1. a barrier consisting of a horizontal bar and supports
2. material for making rails or rails collectively

auth_sentence.content: He's standing at the railing, looking out.
auth_sentence.res_content: He's standing at the railing, looking out.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He's standing at the railing, looking out.

auth_sentence.content: One guy was actually hanging off the railing .
auth_sentence.res_content: One guy was actually hanging off the railing .
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One guy was actually hanging off the railing .

auth_sentence.content: The railing framed three sides of a rectangle.
auth_sentence.res_content: The railing framed three sides of a rectangle.

sentences.en: We tied this letter to a brick and threw it over the railing.
sentences.cn: 我们把信系在砖上,然后抛过栏杆去。

sentences.en: He fell out of the window and was impaled on the iron railings.
sentences.cn: 他从窗口跌下去,身体被铁栏杆刺穿了。

sentences.en: He leant against the railing, his breath coming in short gasps.
sentences.cn: 他倚着栏杆，急促地喘气。
